snippet.title: Arc Raiders Trials Guide - How To CRUSH This Week's Trials (Week of 11/24)
snippet.description:
Raiders! Week 5 of competitive Trials is here, and we’re breaking down every challenge so you can secure easy 3-star rankings and climb the leaderboards. From efficient Snitch farming to mastering the hidden bunker and maximizing your ground kills, this guide gives you everything you need to push points solo or with a squad. Stay sharp, extract safely, and dominate this week’s Trials.

0:00 Intro
2:03 Trial 1 - Damage Rocketeer
3:39 Trial 2 - Download Data From Hidden Bunker
5:39 Trial 3 - Search First Wave Husks
6:41 Trial 4 - Damage Snitches
7:21 Trial 5 - Damage Grounded-Based ARC Enemies
8:31 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
